00268 #define PI_RECURSIVE (1<<1)
00269 #define PI_VALUE     (1<<2)
00270 #define PI_HEX       (1<<3)
00271 #define PI_PAUSE     (1<<4)

00284 void print_help(char *command)
00285 {
00286 #ifndef OS_MSDOS                /* save some DGROUP memory under MS-DOS */
00287    if (!command[0]) {
00288       printf("Database commands ([] are options, <> are placeholders):\n\n");
00289       printf("alarm                   - reset all alarms\n");
00290       printf("cd <dir>                - change current directory\n");
00291       printf("chat                    - enter chat mode\n");
00292       printf("chmod <mode> <key>      - change access mode of a key\n");
00293       printf("                          1=read | 2=write | 4=delete\n");
00294       printf("cleanup [client] [-f]   - delete hanging clients [force]\n");
00295       printf("copy <src> <dest>       - copy a subtree to a new location\n");
00296       printf("create <type> <key>     - create a key of a certain type\n");
00297       printf("create <type> <key>[n]  - create an array of size [n]\n");
00298       printf("del/rm [-l] [-f] <key>  - delete a key and its subkeys\n");
00299       printf("  -l                      follow links\n");
00300       printf("  -f                      force deletion without asking\n");
00301       printf
00302           ("exec <key>/<cmd>        - execute shell command (stored in key) on server\n");
00303       printf("exp <key> <filename>    - import key into ASCII file\n");
00304       printf("find <pattern>          - find a key with wildcard pattern\n");
00305       printf("help/? [command]        - print this help [for a specific command]\n");
00306       printf("hi [analyzer] [id]      - tell analyzer to clear histos\n");
00307       printf("imp <filename> [key]    - import ASCII file into string key\n");
00308       printf("ln <source> <linkname>  - create a link to <source> key\n");
00309       printf
00310           ("load <file>             - load database from .ODB file at current position\n");
00311       printf("-- hit return for more --\r");
00312       getchar();
00313       printf("ls/dir [-lhvrp] [<pat>] - show database entries which match pattern\n");
00314       printf("  -l                      detailed info\n");
00315       printf("  -h                      hex format\n");
00316       printf("  -v                      only value\n");
00317       printf("  -r                      show database entries recursively\n");
00318       printf("  -p                      pause between screens\n");
00319       printf("make [analyzer name]    - create experim.h\n");
00320       printf("mem [-v]                - show memeory usage [verbose]\n");
00321       printf("mkdir <subdir>          - make new <subdir>\n");
00322       printf("move <key> [top/bottom/[n]] - move key to position in keylist\n");
00323       printf("msg [type] [user] <msg> - compose user message\n");
00324       printf("old [n]                 - display old n messages\n");
00325       printf("passwd                  - change MIDAS password\n");
00326       printf("pause                   - pause current run\n");
00327       printf("pwd                     - show current directory\n");
00328       printf("resume                  - resume current run\n");
00329       printf("rename <old> <new>      - rename key\n");
00330       printf("rewind [channel]        - rewind tapes in logger\n");
00331       printf("-- hit return for more --\r");
00332       getchar();
00333       printf("save [-c -s -x] <file>  - save database at current position\n");
00334       printf("                          in ASCII format\n");
00335       printf("  -c                      as a C structure\n");
00336       printf("  -s                      as a #define'd string\n");
00337       printf("  -x                      as a XML file\n");
00338       printf("set <key> <value>       - set the value of a key\n");
00339       printf("set <key>[i] <value>    - set the value of index i\n");
00340       printf("set <key>[*] <value>    - set the value of all indices of a key\n");
00341       printf("set <key>[i..j] <value> - set the value of all indices i..j\n");
00342       printf("scl [-w]                - show all active clients [with watchdog info]\n");
00343       printf("shutdown <client>/all   - shutdown individual or all clients\n");
00344       printf("sor                     - show open records in current subtree\n");
00345       printf("start [number][now][-v] - start a run [with a specific number],\n");
00346       printf
00347           ("                          [now] w/o asking parameters, [-v] debug output\n");
00348       printf("stop [-v]               - stop current run, [-v] debug output\n");
00349       printf("trunc <key> <index>     - truncate key to [index] values\n");
00350       printf("ver                     - show MIDAS library version\n");
00351       printf("webpasswd               - change WWW password for mhttpd\n");
00352       printf("wait <key>              - wait for key to get modified\n");
00353 
00354       printf("\nquit/exit               - exit\n");
00355       return;
00356    }
00357 
00358    if (equal_ustring(command, "cd")) {
00359       printf("cd <dir> - change current directory. Use \"cd /\" to change to the root\n");
00360       printf("           of the ODB, \"cd ..\" to change to the parent directory.\n");
00361    } else if (equal_ustring(command, "chat")) {
00362       printf("chat - enter chat mode. In this mode, users can \"talk\" to each other.\n");
00363       printf
00364           ("       Each user running ODBEdit connected to the same experiment can see\n");
00365       printf
00366           ("       the other messages and each user running ODBEdit in chat mode can\n");
00367       printf
00368           ("       produce messages. All messages are logged in the MIDAS logging file.\n");
00369    } else
00370       printf("No specific help available for command \"%s\".\n", command);
00371 
00372 #endif
00373 }

00377 void process_message(HNDLE hBuf, HNDLE id, EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *message)
00378 {
00379    time_t tm;
00380    char str[80];
00381 
00382    /* prepare time */
00383    time(&tm);
00384    strcpy(str, ctime(&tm));
00385    str[19] = 0;
00386 
00387    /* print message text which comes after event header */
00388    if (in_cmd_edit)
00389       printf("\r%s %s\n", str + 11, (char *) message);
00390    else
00391       printf("\n%s %s\n", str + 11, (char *) message);
00392 
00393    need_redraw = TRUE;
00394 }
00395 
00396 int print_message(const char *msg)
00397 {
00398    if (in_cmd_edit)
00399       printf("\r%s\n", msg);
00400    else
00401       printf("%s\n", msg);
00402 
00403    need_redraw = TRUE;
00404    return 0;
00405 }

00407 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408 
00409 BOOL match(char *pat, char *str)
00410 /* process a wildcard match */
00411 {
00412    if (!*str)
00413       return *pat == '*' ? match(pat + 1, str) : !*pat;
00414 
00415    switch (*pat) {
00416    case '\0':
00417       return 0;
00418    case '*':
00419       return match(pat + 1, str) || match(pat, str + 1);
00420    case '?':
00421       return match(pat + 1, str + 1);
00422    default:
00423       return (toupper(*pat) == toupper(*str)) && match(pat + 1, str + 1);
00424    }
00425 }
00426 
00427 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00428 
00429 int ls_line, ls_abort;
00430 
00431 BOOL check_abort(int flags, int l)
00432 {
00433    int c;
00434 
00435    if ((flags & PI_PAUSE) && (l % 24) == 23) {
00436       printf("Press any key to continue or q to quit ");
00437       fflush(stdout);
00438       do {
00439          c = ss_getchar(0);
00440          if (c == 'q') {
00441             printf("\n");
00442             ls_abort = TRUE;
00443             return TRUE;
00444          } else if (c > 0) {
00445             printf("\r                                        \r");
00446             return FALSE;
00447          }
00448 
00449          cm_yield(100);
00450 
00451       } while (!cm_is_ctrlc_pressed());
00452    }
00453 
00454    if (cm_is_ctrlc_pressed()) {
00455       ls_abort = TRUE;
00456       return TRUE;
00457    }
00458 
00459    return FALSE;
00460 }
00461 
00462 
00463 INT print_key(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, KEY * key, INT level, void *info)
00464 {
00465    INT i, size, status;
00466    static char data_str[50000], line[256];
00467    DWORD delta;
00468    PRINT_INFO *pi;
00469 
00470    if (ls_abort)
00471       return 0;
00472 
00473    pi = (PRINT_INFO *) info;
00474 
00475    /* if pattern set, check if match */
00476    if (pi->pattern[0] && !match(pi->pattern, key->name))
00477       return SUCCESS;
00478 
00479    size = sizeof(data);
00480    if (pi->flags & PI_VALUE) {
00481       /* only print value */
00482       if (key->type != TID_KEY) {
00483          status = db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key->type);
00484          if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
00485             strcpy(data_str, "<no read access>");
00486          else
00487             for (i = 0; i < key->num_values; i++) {
00488                if (pi->flags & PI_HEX)
00489                   db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key->item_size, i, key->type);
00490                else
00491                   db_sprintf(data_str, data, key->item_size, i, key->type);
00492 
00493                if ((pi->index != -1 && i == pi->index) || pi->index == -1)
00494                   printf("%s\n", data_str);
00495                if (check_abort(pi->flags, ls_line++))
00496                   return 0;
00497             }
00498       }
00499    } else {
00500       /* print key name with value */
00501       memset(line, ' ', 80);
00502       line[80] = 0;
00503       sprintf(line + level * 4, "%s", key->name);
00504       if (pi->index != -1)
00505          sprintf(line + strlen(line), "[%d]", pi->index);
00506       line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00507 
00508       if (key->type == TID_KEY) {
00509          if (pi->flags & PI_LONG)
00510             sprintf(line + 32, "DIR");
00511          else
00512             line[32] = 0;
00513          printf("%s\n", line);
00514          if (check_abort(pi->flags, ls_line++))
00515             return 0;
00516       } else {
00517          status = db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key->type);
00518          if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
00519             strcpy(data_str, "<no read access>");
00520          else {
00521             if (pi->flags & PI_HEX)
00522                db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key->item_size, 0, key->type);
00523             else
00524                db_sprintf(data_str, data, key->item_size, 0, key->type);
00525          }
00526 
00527          if (pi->flags & PI_LONG) {
00528             sprintf(line + 32, "%s", rpc_tid_name(key->type));
00529             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00530             sprintf(line + 40, "%d", key->num_values);
00531             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00532             sprintf(line + 46, "%d", key->item_size);
00533             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00534 
00535             db_get_key_time(hDB, hKey, &delta);
00536             if (delta < 60)
00537                sprintf(line + 52, "%lds", delta);
00538             else if (delta < 3600)
00539                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfm", delta / 60.0);
00540             else if (delta < 86400)
00541                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfh", delta / 3600.0);
00542             else if (delta < 86400 * 99)
00543                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfh", delta / 86400.0);
00544             else
00545                sprintf(line + 52, ">99d");
00546             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00547 
00548             sprintf(line + 57, "%d", key->notify_count);
00549             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00550 
00551             if (key->access_mode & MODE_READ)
00552                line[61] = 'R';
00553             if (key->access_mode & MODE_WRITE)
00554                line[62] = 'W';
00555             if (key->access_mode & MODE_DELETE)
00556                line[63] = 'D';
00557             if (key->access_mode & MODE_EXCLUSIVE)
00558                line[64] = 'E';
00559 
00560             if (key->type == TID_STRING && strchr(data_str, '\n'))
00561                strcpy(line + 66, "<multi-line>");
00562             else if (key->num_values == 1)
00563                strcpy(line + 66, data_str);
00564             else
00565                line[66] = 0;
00566          } else if (key->num_values == 1)
00567             if (key->type == TID_STRING && strchr(data_str, '\n'))
00568                strcpy(line + 32, "<multi-line>");
00569             else
00570                strcpy(line + 32, data_str);
00571          else
00572             line[32] = 0;
00573 
00574          printf("%s\n", line);
00575 
00576          if (key->type == TID_STRING && strchr(data_str, '\n'))
00577             puts(data_str);
00578 
00579          if (check_abort(pi->flags, ls_line++))
00580             return 0;
00581 
00582          if (key->num_values > 1) {
00583             for (i = 0; i < key->num_values; i++) {
00584                if (pi->flags & PI_HEX)
00585                   db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key->item_size, i, key->type);
00586                else
00587                   db_sprintf(data_str, data, key->item_size, i, key->type);
00588 
00589                memset(line, ' ', 80);
00590                line[80] = 0;
00591 
00592                if (pi->flags & PI_LONG) {
00593                   sprintf(line + 40, "[%d]", i);
00594                   line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00595 
00596                   strcpy(line + 56, data_str);
00597                } else
00598                   strcpy(line + 32, data_str);
00599 
00600                if ((pi->index != -1 && i == pi->index) || pi->index == -1)
00601                   printf("%s\n", line);
00602 
00603                if (check_abort(pi->flags, ls_line++))
00604                   return 0;
00605             }
00606          }
00607       }
00608    }
00609 
00610    return SUCCESS;
00611 }
00612 
00613 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00614 
00615 void set_key(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, int index1, int index2, char *value)
00616 {
00617    KEY key;
00618    char data[1000];
00619    int i, size, status = 0;
00620 
00621    db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
00622 
00623    memset(data, 0, sizeof(data));
00624    db_sscanf(value, data, &size, 0, key.type);
00625 
00626    /* extend data size for single string if necessary */
00627    if ((key.type == TID_STRING || key.type == TID_LINK)
00628        && (int) strlen(data) + 1 > key.item_size && key.num_values == 1)
00629       key.item_size = strlen(data) + 1;
00630 
00631    if (key.item_size == 0)
00632       key.item_size = rpc_tid_size(key.type);
00633 
00634    if (key.num_values > 1 && index1 == -1) {
00635       for (i = 0; i < key.num_values; i++)
00636          status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, i, key.type);
00637    } else if (key.num_values > 1 && index2 > index1) {
00638       for (i = index1; i < key.num_values && i <= index2; i++)
00639          status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, i, key.type);
00640    } else if (key.num_values > 1 || index1 > 0)
00641       status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, index1, key.type);
00642    else
00643       status = db_set_data(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, 1, key.type);
00644 
00645    if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
00646       printf("Write access not allowed\n");
00647 }
00648 
00649 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00650 
00651 void scan_tree(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, INT * total_size_key, INT * total_size_data,
00652                INT level, INT flags)
00653 {
00654    INT i, j, size, status;
00655    KEY key;
00656    HNDLE hSubkey;
00657    static char data_str[256], line[256];
00658    DWORD delta;
00659 
00660    if (cm_is_ctrlc_pressed()) {
00661       if (level == 0)
00662          cm_ack_ctrlc_pressed();
00663       return;
00664    }
00665 
00666    db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
00667    size = sizeof(data);
00668 
00669    *total_size_key += ALIGN8(sizeof(KEY));
00670    if (key.type == TID_KEY)
00671       *total_size_key += ALIGN8(sizeof(KEYLIST));
00672    else
00673       *total_size_data += ALIGN8(key.total_size);
00674 
00675    if (flags & 0x4) {
00676       /* only print value */
00677       if (key.type != TID_KEY) {
00678          status = db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key.type);
00679          if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
00680             strcpy(data_str, "<no read access>");
00681          else
00682             for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
00683                if (flags & 0x8)
00684                   db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key.item_size, j, key.type);
00685                else
00686                   db_sprintf(data_str, data, key.item_size, j, key.type);
00687                printf("%s\n", data_str);
00688             }
00689       }
00690    } else {
00691       /* print key name with value */
00692       memset(line, ' ', 80);
00693       line[80] = 0;
00694       sprintf(line + level * 4, "%s", key.name);
00695       line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00696 
00697       if (key.type == TID_KEY) {
00698          line[32] = 0;
00699          printf("%s\n", line);
00700       } else {
00701          status = db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key.type);
00702          if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
00703             strcpy(data_str, "<no read access>");
00704          else {
00705             if (flags & 0x8)
00706                db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key.item_size, 0, key.type);
00707             else
00708                db_sprintf(data_str, data, key.item_size, 0, key.type);
00709          }
00710 
00711          if (flags & 0x1) {
00712             sprintf(line + 32, "%s", rpc_tid_name(key.type));
00713             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00714             sprintf(line + 40, "%d", key.num_values);
00715             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00716             sprintf(line + 46, "%d", key.item_size);
00717             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00718 
00719             db_get_key_time(hDB, hKey, &delta);
00720             if (delta < 60)
00721                sprintf(line + 52, "%lds", delta);
00722             else if (delta < 3600)
00723                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfm", delta / 60.0);
00724             else if (delta < 86400)
00725                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfh", delta / 3600.0);
00726             else if (delta < 86400 * 99)
00727                sprintf(line + 52, "%1.0lfh", delta / 86400.0);
00728             else
00729                sprintf(line + 52, ">99d");
00730             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00731 
00732             sprintf(line + 57, "%d", key.notify_count);
00733             line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00734 
00735             if (key.access_mode & MODE_READ)
00736                line[61] = 'R';
00737             if (key.access_mode & MODE_WRITE)
00738                line[62] = 'W';
00739             if (key.access_mode & MODE_DELETE)
00740                line[63] = 'D';
00741             if (key.access_mode & MODE_EXCLUSIVE)
00742                line[64] = 'E';
00743 
00744             if (key.num_values == 1)
00745                strcpy(line + 66, data_str);
00746             else
00747                line[66] = 0;
00748          } else if (key.num_values == 1)
00749             strcpy(line + 32, data_str);
00750          else
00751             line[32] = 0;
00752 
00753          printf("%s\n", line);
00754 
00755          if (key.num_values > 1) {
00756             for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
00757                if (flags & 0x8)
00758                   db_sprintfh(data_str, data, key.item_size, j, key.type);
00759                else
00760                   db_sprintf(data_str, data, key.item_size, j, key.type);
00761 
00762                memset(line, ' ', 80);
00763                line[80] = 0;
00764 
00765                if (flags & 0x1) {
00766                   sprintf(line + 40, "[%d]", j);
00767                   line[strlen(line)] = ' ';
00768 
00769                   strcpy(line + 56, data_str);
00770                } else
00771                   strcpy(line + 32, data_str);
00772 
00773                printf("%s\n", line);
00774             }
00775          }
00776       }
00777    }
00778 
00779    /* recurse subtree */
00780    if (key.type == TID_KEY && (flags & 0x2)) {
00781       for (i = 0;; i++) {
00782          db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00783 
00784          if (!hSubkey)
00785             break;
00786 
00787          scan_tree(hDB, hSubkey, total_size_key, total_size_data, level + 1, flags);
00788 
00789          if (cm_is_ctrlc_pressed()) {
00790             if (level == 0)
00791                cm_ack_ctrlc_pressed();
00792             return;
00793          }
00794       }
00795    }
00796 }
00797 
00798 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00799 
00800 /* complete partial key name, gets called from cmd_edit */
00801 INT cmd_dir(char *line, INT * cursor)
00802 {
00803    KEY key;
00804    HNDLE hDB, hKey, hSubkey;
00805    INT i, j, match, size;
00806    char str[256], *pc, partial[256], last_match[256], head[256], tail[256], key_name[256],
00807        c;
00808    char test_key[256];
00809    BOOL blanks, mismatch;
00810 
00811    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00812 
00813    /* remember tail for later */
00814    strcpy(head, line);
00815    strcpy(tail, line + *cursor);
00816    line[*cursor] = 0;
00817 
00818    /* search beginning of key */
00819    pc = head;
00820    do {
00821       while (*pc && *pc != ' ')
00822          pc++;
00823       while (*pc && *pc == ' ')
00824          pc++;
00825    } while (*pc == '-');        /* skip flags */
00826 
00827    if (*pc) {
00828       strcpy(key_name, pc);
00829       *pc = 0;                  /* end of head */
00830    } else
00831       key_name[0] = 0;
00832 
00833    /* check if key exists (for "set <key>" completion) */
00834    if (strncmp(head, "set", 3) == 0 && strlen(key_name) > 0) {
00835       if (key_name[0] == '"')
00836          strcpy(str, key_name + 1);
00837       else
00838          strcpy(str, key_name);
00839       if (key_name[0] != '/') {
00840          strcpy(test_key, pwd);
00841          if (str[strlen(test_key) - 1] != '/')
00842             strcat(test_key, "/");
00843          strcat(test_key, str);
00844       } else
00845          strcpy(test_key, str);
00846 
00847       pc = test_key + strlen(test_key) - 1;
00848       while (pc > test_key && (*pc == ' ' || *pc == '"'))
00849          *pc-- = 0;
00850       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, test_key, &hSubkey) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00851          /* retrieve key data */
00852          db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00853          size = sizeof(data);
00854          db_get_data(hDB, hSubkey, data, &size, key.type);
00855          db_sprintf(str, data, size, 0, key.type);
00856 
00857          strcpy(line, head);
00858          strcat(line, key_name);
00859          strcat(line, str);
00860          *cursor = strlen(line);
00861          strcat(line, tail);
00862          return TRUE;
00863       }
00864    }
00865 
00866    /* combine pwd and key_name */
00867    pc = key_name;
00868    if (*pc == '"')
00869       pc++;
00870 
00871    if (*pc != '/') {
00872       strcpy(str, pwd);
00873       if (str[strlen(str) - 1] != '/')
00874          strcat(str, "/");
00875       strcat(str, pc);
00876    } else
00877       strcpy(str, pc);
00878 
00879    /* split key_name into known and new directory */
00880    for (pc = str + strlen(str) - 1; pc > str && *pc != '/'; pc--);
00881 
00882    if (*pc == '/') {
00883       *pc = 0;
00884       strcpy(partial, pc + 1);
00885    } else
00886       strcpy(partial, str);
00887 
00888    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
00889    for (i = 0, match = 0;; i++) {
00890       db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00891 
00892       if (!hSubkey)
00893          break;
00894 
00895       db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00896       strcpy(str, key.name);
00897 
00898       str[strlen(partial)] = 0;
00899 
00900       if (equal_ustring(str, partial))
00901          match++;
00902    }
00903 
00904    if (match != 1)
00905       printf("\r\n");
00906 
00907    for (i = 0;; i++) {
00908       db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00909 
00910       if (!hSubkey)
00911          break;
00912 
00913       db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00914       strcpy(str, key.name);
00915 
00916       str[strlen(partial)] = 0;
00917 
00918       if (equal_ustring(str, partial)) {
00919          if (match == 1) {
00920             /* search split point */
00921             pc = key_name;
00922             if (strlen(key_name) > 0)
00923                for (pc = key_name + strlen(key_name) - 1; pc > key_name && *pc != '/';
00924                     pc--);
00925             if (*pc == '/')
00926                pc++;
00927 
00928             strcpy(pc, key.name);
00929             if (key.type == TID_KEY)
00930                strcat(pc, "/");
00931 
00932             /* insert '"' if blanks in name */
00933             if (strchr(key.name, ' ')) {
00934                if (key_name[0] != '"') {
00935                   for (i = strlen(key_name); i >= 0; i--)
00936                      key_name[i + 1] = key_name[i];
00937 
00938                   key_name[0] = '"';
00939                }
00940                if (key.type != TID_KEY)
00941                   strcat(key_name, "\"");
00942             }
00943 
00944             if (key.type != TID_KEY) {
00945                if (key_name[0] == '"' && key_name[strlen(key_name) - 1] != '"')
00946                   strcat(pc, "\" ");
00947                else
00948                   strcat(pc, " ");
00949             }
00950 
00951             strcpy(line, head);
00952             strcat(line, key_name);
00953             *cursor = strlen(line);
00954             strcat(line, tail);
00955             return TRUE;
00956          }
00957       }
00958       if (match == 0 || (match > 1 && equal_ustring(str, partial)))
00959          printf("%s\r\n", key.name);
00960    }
00961 
00962    if (match > 1 && key_name[0]) {
00963       blanks = FALSE;
00964 
00965       for (j = strlen(partial);; j++) {
00966          for (i = 0, c = 1, mismatch = FALSE;; i++) {
00967             db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00968 
00969             if (!hSubkey)
00970                break;
00971 
00972             db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00973             strcpy(str, key.name);
00974 
00975             str[strlen(partial)] = 0;
00976 
00977             if (strchr(key.name, ' '))
00978                blanks = TRUE;
00979 
00980             if (equal_ustring(str, partial)) {
00981                strcpy(last_match, key.name);
00982                if (c == 1)
00983                   c = toupper(key.name[j]);
00984                else if (c != toupper(key.name[j])) {
00985                   mismatch = TRUE;
00986                   break;
00987                }
00988             }
00989          }
00990 
00991          if (mismatch || last_match[j] == 0)
00992             break;
00993       }
00994 
00995       /* search split point */
00996       for (pc = key_name + strlen(key_name) - 1; pc > key_name && *pc != '/'; pc--);
00997       if (*pc == '/')
00998          pc++;
00999 
01000       for (i = 0; i < j; i++)
01001          pc[i] = last_match[i];
01002       pc[i] = 0;
01003 
01004       /* insert '"' if blanks in name */
01005       if (blanks) {
01006          if (key_name[0] != '"') {
01007             for (i = strlen(key_name); i >= 0; i--)
01008                key_name[i + 1] = key_name[i];
01009 
01010             key_name[0] = '"';
01011          }
01012       }
01013 
01014       strcpy(line, head);
01015       strcat(line, key_name);
01016       *cursor = strlen(line);
01017       strcat(line, tail);
01018       return TRUE;
01019    }
01020 
01021    /* beep if not found */
01022    printf("\007");
01023 
01024    strcpy(line, head);
01025    strcat(line, key_name);
01026    *cursor = strlen(line);
01027    strcat(line, tail);
01028    return FALSE;
01029 }
01030 
01031 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01032 
01033 INT search_key(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, KEY * key, INT level, void *info)
01034 {
01035    INT i, size, status;
01036    char *pattern;
01037    static char data_str[MAX_ODB_PATH], line[MAX_ODB_PATH];
01038    char path[MAX_ODB_PATH];
01039 
01040    pattern = (char *) info;
01041 
01042    if (match(pattern, key->name)) {
01043       db_get_path(hDB, hKey, path, MAX_ODB_PATH);
01044       strcpy(line, path);
01045       strcat(line, " : ");
01046 
01047       if (key->type != TID_KEY) {
01048          size = sizeof(data);
01049          status = db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key->type);
01050 
01051          if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
01052             strcpy(data_str, "<no read access>");
01053          else
01054             db_sprintf(data_str, data, key->item_size, 0, key->type);
01055 
01056          if (key->num_values == 1)
01057             strcat(line, data_str);
01058 
01059          printf("%s\n", line);
01060 
01061          if (key->num_values > 1)
01062             for (i = 0; i < key->num_values; i++) {
01063                db_sprintf(data_str, data, key->item_size, i, key->type);
01064 
01065                printf("  [%d] : %s\n", i, data_str);
01066             }
01067       } else
01068          printf("%s\n", line);
01069    }
01070 
01071    return SUCCESS;
01072 }
01073 
01074 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01075 
01076 void del_tree(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, INT level)
01077 {
01078    INT i;
01079    KEY key;
01080    HNDLE hSubkey;
01081 
01082    for (i = 0;; i++) {
01083       db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
01084 
01085       if (!hSubkey)
01086          break;
01087 
01088       db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
01089       if (key.type == TID_KEY)
01090          del_tree(hDB, hSubkey, level + 1);
01091 
01092       if (rand() < RAND_MAX / 10)
01093          db_delete_key(hDB, hSubkey, 0);
01094    }
01095 }
01096 
01097 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01098 
01099 void create_experim_h(HNDLE hDB, char *analyzer_name)
01100 {
01101    INT i, index, subindex, hfile, status, size;
01102    HNDLE hKey, hKeyRoot, hKeyEq, hDefKey, hKeyBank, hKeyPar;
01103    char str[80], eq_name[80], subeq_name[80];
01104    KEY key;
01105    time_t now;
01106 
01107    char experim_h_comment1[] =
01108        "/********************************************************************\\\n\
01109 \n\
01110   Name:         experim.h\n\
01111   Created by:   ODBedit program\n\
01112 \n\
01113   Contents:     This file contains C structures for the \"Experiment\"\n\
01114                 tree in the ODB and the \"/Analyzer/Parameters\" tree.\n\
01115 \n\
01116                 Additionally, it contains the \"Settings\" subtree for\n\
01117                 all items listed under \"/Equipment\" as well as their\n\
01118                 event definition.\n\
01119 \n\
01120                 It can be used by the frontend and analyzer to work\n\
01121                 with these information.\n\
01122 \n\
01123                 All C structures are accompanied with a string represen-\n\
01124                 tation which can be used in the db_create_record function\n\
01125                 to setup an ODB structure which matches the C structure.\n\
01126 \n";
01127    char experim_h_comment2[] =
01128        "\\********************************************************************/\n\n";
01129 
01130    char *file_name = "experim.h";
01131 
01132    /* create file */
01133    hfile = open(file_name, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC, 0644);
01134    if (hfile == -1)
01135       cm_msg(MERROR, "create_experim_h", "cannot open experim.h file.");
01136 
01137    /* write comment to file */
01138    write(hfile, experim_h_comment1, strlen(experim_h_comment1));
01139    time(&now);
01140    sprintf(str, "  Created on:   %s\n", ctime(&now));
01141    write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01142    write(hfile, experim_h_comment2, strlen(experim_h_comment2));
01143 
01144    /* write /experiment/run parameters */
01145    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Run Parameters", &hKey);
01146    if (hKey) {
01147       sprintf(str, "#define EXP_PARAM_DEFINED\n\n");
01148       write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01149       db_save_struct(hDB, hKey, file_name, "EXP_PARAM", TRUE);
01150       db_save_string(hDB, hKey, file_name, "EXP_PARAM_STR", TRUE);
01151       lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01152    }
01153 
01154    /* write /experiment/edit on start */
01155    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Edit on start", &hKey);
01156    if (hKey) {
01157       sprintf(str, "#define EXP_EDIT_DEFINED\n\n");
01158       write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01159       db_save_struct(hDB, hKey, file_name, "EXP_EDIT", TRUE);
01160       db_save_string(hDB, hKey, file_name, "EXP_EDIT_STR", TRUE);
01161       lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01162    }
01163 
01164    /* write /<Analyzer>/parameters tree */
01165    sprintf(str, "/%s/Parameters", analyzer_name);
01166    status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKeyRoot);
01167    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
01168       printf("Analyzer \"%s\" not found in ODB, skipping analyzer parameters.\n",
01169              analyzer_name);
01170    } else {
01171       for (index = 0;; index++) {
01172          status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, index, &hKeyPar);
01173          if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01174             break;
01175 
01176          db_get_key(hDB, hKeyPar, &key);
01177          strcpy(eq_name, key.name);
01178          name2c(eq_name);
01179          for (i = 0; i < (int) strlen(eq_name); i++)
01180             eq_name[i] = toupper(eq_name[i]);
01181 
01182          lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01183          sprintf(str, "#ifndef EXCL_%s\n\n", eq_name);
01184          write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01185 
01186          sprintf(str, "#define %s_PARAM_DEFINED\n\n", eq_name);
01187          write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01188          sprintf(str, "%s_PARAM", eq_name);
01189          db_save_struct(hDB, hKeyPar, file_name, str, TRUE);
01190          sprintf(str, "%s_PARAM_STR", eq_name);
01191          db_save_string(hDB, hKeyPar, file_name, str, TRUE);
01192 
01193          lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01194          sprintf(str, "#endif\n\n");
01195          write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01196       }
01197    }
01198 
01199    /* loop through equipment list */
01200    status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Equipment", &hKeyRoot);
01201    if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01202       for (index = 0;; index++) {
01203          status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, index, &hKeyEq);
01204          if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01205             break;
01206 
01207          db_get_key(hDB, hKeyEq, &key);
01208          strcpy(eq_name, key.name);
01209          name2c(eq_name);
01210          for (i = 0; i < (int) strlen(eq_name); i++)
01211             eq_name[i] = toupper(eq_name[i]);
01212 
01213          lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01214          sprintf(str, "#ifndef EXCL_%s\n\n", eq_name);
01215          write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01216 
01217          size = sizeof(str);
01218          str[0] = 0;
01219          db_get_value(hDB, hKeyEq, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
01220 
01221          /* if event is in fixed format, extract header file */
01222          if (equal_ustring(str, "Fixed")) {
01223             db_find_key(hDB, hKeyEq, "Variables", &hDefKey);
01224             if (hDefKey) {
01225                lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01226                sprintf(str, "#define %s_EVENT_DEFINED\n\n", eq_name);
01227                write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01228 
01229                sprintf(str, "%s_EVENT", eq_name);
01230                db_save_struct(hDB, hDefKey, file_name, str, TRUE);
01231                sprintf(str, "%s_EVENT_STR", eq_name);
01232                db_save_string(hDB, hDefKey, file_name, str, TRUE);
01233             }
01234          }
01235 
01236          /* if event is in MIDAS format, extract bank definition */
01237          else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS")) {
01238             db_find_key(hDB, hKeyEq, "Variables", &hDefKey);
01239             if (hDefKey) {
01240                for (i = 0;; i++) {
01241                   status = db_enum_key(hDB, hDefKey, i, &hKeyBank);
01242                   if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01243                      break;
01244 
01245                   db_get_key(hDB, hKeyBank, &key);
01246 
01247                   if (key.type == TID_KEY) {
01248                      lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01249                      sprintf(str, "#define %s_BANK_DEFINED\n\n", key.name);
01250                      write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01251 
01252                      sprintf(str, "%s_BANK", key.name);
01253                      db_save_struct(hDB, hKeyBank, file_name, str, TRUE);
01254                      sprintf(str, "%s_BANK_STR", key.name);
01255                      db_save_string(hDB, hKeyBank, file_name, str, TRUE);
01256                   }
01257                }
01258             }
01259          }
01260 
01261          /* Scan sub tree for that equipment */
01262          for (subindex = 0;; subindex++) {
01263             status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyEq, subindex, &hDefKey);
01264             if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
01265                break;
01266 
01267             db_get_key(hDB, hDefKey, &key);
01268             strcpy(subeq_name, key.name);
01269             name2c(subeq_name);
01270 
01271             for (i = 0; i < (int) strlen(subeq_name); i++)
01272                subeq_name[i] = toupper(subeq_name[i]);
01273 
01274             /* Skip only the statistics */
01275             if (!equal_ustring(subeq_name, "statistics") &&
01276                 !equal_ustring(subeq_name, "variables")) {
01277                lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01278                sprintf(str, "#define %s_%s_DEFINED\n\n", eq_name, subeq_name);
01279                write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01280 
01281                sprintf(str, "%s_%s", eq_name, subeq_name);
01282                db_save_struct(hDB, hDefKey, file_name, str, TRUE);
01283                sprintf(str, "%s_%s_STR", eq_name, subeq_name);
01284                db_save_string(hDB, hDefKey, file_name, str, TRUE);
01285             }
01286          }
01287 
01288          lseek(hfile, 0, SEEK_END);
01289          sprintf(str, "#endif\n\n");
01290          write(hfile, str, strlen(str));
01291       }
01292 
01293    close(hfile);
01294 
01295    getcwd(str, sizeof(str));
01296    printf("\"experim.h\" has been written to %s\n", str);
01297 }
01298 
01299 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01300 
01301 INT cmd_idle()
01302 {
01303    INT status;
01304 
01305    need_redraw = FALSE;
01306 
01307    status = cm_yield(100);
01308 
01309    /* abort if server connection is broken */
01310    if (status == SS_ABORT || status == RPC_SHUTDOWN) {
01311       if (status == SS_ABORT)
01312          printf("Server connection broken.\n");
01313 
01314       cm_disconnect_experiment();
01315       exit(0);
01316    }
01317 
01318    /* check for broken client connections */
01319    rpc_client_check();
01320 
01321    return need_redraw;
01322 }
01323 
01324 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01325 
01326 void compose_name(char *pwd, char *name, char *full_name)
01327 {
01328    if (name[0] != '/') {
01329       strcpy(full_name, pwd);
01330       if (full_name[strlen(full_name) - 1] != '/')
01331          strcat(full_name, "/");
01332       strcat(full_name, name);
01333    } else
01334       strcpy(full_name, name);
01335 }
01336 
01337 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01338 
01339 void assemble_prompt(char *prompt, char *host_name, char *exp_name, char *pwd)
01340 {
01341    HNDLE hDB;
01342    char mask[256], str[32];
01343    int state, size;
01344    char *pp, *pm, *pc;
01345    time_t now;
01346 
01347    char *state_char[] = { "U", "S", "P", "R" };
01348    char *state_str[] = { "Unknown", "Stopped", "Paused", "Running" };
01349 
01350    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
01351 
01352    size = sizeof(mask);
01353    strcpy(mask, "[%h:%e:%s]%p>");
01354    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/System/Prompt", mask, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
01355 
01356    state = STATE_STOPPED;
01357    size = sizeof(state);
01358    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &state, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
01359    if (state > STATE_RUNNING)
01360       state = 0;
01361 
01362    pm = mask;
01363    pp = prompt;
01364    do {
01365       if (*pm != '%') {
01366          *pp++ = *pm++;
01367          *pp = 0;
01368       } else {
01369          switch (*++pm) {
01370          case 't':
01371             time(&now);
01372             strcpy(str, ctime(&now));
01373             str[19] = 0;
01374             strcpy(pp, str + 11);
01375             break;
01376          case 'h':
01377             if (host_name[0])
01378                strcat(pp, host_name);
01379             else
01380                strcat(pp, "local");
01381             break;
01382          case 'e':
01383             if (exp_name[0])
01384                strcat(pp, exp_name);
01385             else
01386                strcat(pp, "Default");
01387             break;
01388          case 's':
01389             strcat(pp, state_char[state]);
01390             break;
01391          case 'S':
01392             strcat(pp, state_str[state]);
01393             break;
01394          case 'P':
01395             strcat(pp, pwd);
01396             break;
01397          case 'p':
01398             pc = pwd + strlen(pwd) - 1;
01399             while (*pc != '/' && pc != pwd)
01400                pc--;
01401             if (pc == pwd)
01402                strcat(pp, pwd);
01403             else
01404                strcat(pp, pc + 1);
01405             break;
01406          }
01407          pm++;
01408          pp += strlen(pp);
01409       }
01410    } while (*pm);
01411 }
01412 
01413 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01414 
01415 void command_loop(char *host_name, char *exp_name, char *cmd, char *start_dir)
01416 {
01417    INT status = 0, i, j, state, size, old_run_number, new_run_number, channel;
01418    char line[256], prompt[256];
01419    char param[10][100];
01420    char str[256], old_dir[256], cwd[256], name[256], *pc, data_str[256];
01421    char old_password[32], new_password[32];
01422    INT nparam, flags, index1, index2, debug_flag;
01423    WORD mode;
01424    HNDLE hDB, hKey, hKeyClient, hSubkey, hRootKey;
01425    KEY key;
01426    char user_name[80] = "";
01427    FILE *cmd_file = NULL;
01428    DWORD last_msg_time = 0;
01429    char message[256], client_name[256], *p;
01430    INT n1, n2, msg_type;
01431    PRINT_INFO print_info;
01432 
01433    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKeyClient);
01434 
01435    /* command loop */
01436    if (start_dir[0])
01437       strcpy(pwd, start_dir);
01438    else
01439       strcpy(pwd, "/");
01440 
01441    /* check if dir exists */
01442    if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey) != DB_SUCCESS) {
01443       printf("Directory \"%s\" not found.\n", pwd);
01444       return;
01445    }
01446 
01447    /* open command file */
01448    if (cmd[0] == '@') {
01449       cmd_file = fopen(cmd + 1, "r");
01450       if (cmd_file == NULL) {
01451          printf("Command file %s not found.\n", cmd + 1);
01452          return;
01453       }
01454    }
01455 
01456    do {
01457       /* print prompt */
01458       if (!cmd_mode) {
01459          assemble_prompt(prompt, host_name, exp_name, pwd);
01460 
01461          in_cmd_edit = TRUE;
01462          line[0] = 0;
01463          cmd_edit(prompt, line, cmd_dir, cmd_idle);
01464          in_cmd_edit = FALSE;
01465       } else if (cmd[0] != '@')
01466          strcpy(line, cmd);
01467       else {
01468          memset(line, 0, sizeof(line));
01469          fgets(line, sizeof(line), cmd_file);
01470 
01471          if (line[0] == 0)
01472             break;
01473 
01474          /* cut off CR */
01475          while (strlen(line) > 0 && line[strlen(line) - 1] == '\n')
01476             line[strlen(line) - 1] = 0;
01477 
01478          if (line[0] == 0)
01479             continue;
01480       }
01481 
01482       /* analyze line */
01483       nparam = 0;
01484       pc = line;
01485       while (*pc == ' ')
01486          pc++;
01487 
01488       memset(param, 0, sizeof(param));
01489       do {
01490          if (*pc == '"') {
01491             pc++;
01492             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '"'; i++)
01493                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
01494 /*
01495         while(strlen(param[nparam]) > 0 && param[nparam][strlen(param[nparam])-1] == ' ')
01496           param[nparam][strlen(param[nparam])-1] = 0;
01497 */
01498             if (*pc)
01499                pc++;
01500          } else if (*pc == '\'') {
01501             pc++;
01502             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '\''; i++)
01503                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
01504             if (*pc)
01505                pc++;
01506          } else if (*pc == '`') {
01507             pc++;
01508             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '`'; i++)
01509                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
01510             if (*pc)
01511                pc++;
01512          } else
01513             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != ' '; i++)
01514                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
01515          param[nparam][i] = 0;
01516          while (*pc == ' ')
01517             pc++;
01518          nparam++;
01519       } while (*pc);
01520 
01521       /* help */
01522       if ((param[0][0] == 'h' && param[0][1] == 'e') || param[0][0] == '?')
01523          print_help(param[1]);
01524 
01525       /* ls */
01526       else if ((param[0][0] == 'l' && param[0][1] == 's') ||
01527                (param[0][0] == 'd' && param[0][1] == 'i')) {
01528          db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
01529          print_info.flags = 0;
01530          print_info.pattern[0] = 0;
01531          ls_line = 0;
01532          ls_abort = FALSE;
01533 
01534          /* parse options */
01535          for (i = 1; i < 4; i++)
01536             if (param[i][0] == '-') {
01537                for (j = 1; param[i][j] != ' ' && param[i][j]; j++) {
01538                   if (param[i][j] == 'l')
01539                      print_info.flags |= PI_LONG;
01540                   if (param[i][j] == 'r')
01541                      print_info.flags |= PI_RECURSIVE;
01542                   if (param[i][j] == 'v')
01543                      print_info.flags |= PI_VALUE;
01544                   if (param[i][j] == 'h')
01545                      print_info.flags |= PI_HEX;
01546                   if (param[i][j] == 'p')
01547                      print_info.flags |= PI_PAUSE;
01548                }
01549             }
01550 
01551          for (i = 1; param[i][0] == '-'; i++);
01552 
01553          /* check if parameter contains array index */
01554          print_info.index = -1;
01555          if (strchr(param[i], '[') && strchr(param[i], ']')) {
01556             for (p = strchr(param[i], '[') + 1; *p && *p != ']'; p++)
01557                if (!isdigit(*p))
01558                   break;
01559 
01560             if (*p && *p == ']') {
01561                print_info.index = atoi(strchr(param[i], '[') + 1);
01562                *strchr(param[i], '[') = 0;
01563             }
01564          }
01565 
01566          if (param[i][0]) {
01567             if (strpbrk(param[i], "*?") != NULL) {
01568                /* if parameter contains wildcards, set pattern */
01569                strcpy(print_info.pattern, param[i]);
01570             } else {
01571                if (param[i][0] == '/')
01572                   status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, param[i], &hKey);
01573                else
01574                   status = db_find_key(hDB, hKey, param[i], &hKey);
01575 
01576                if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
01577                   printf("key %s not found\n", param[i]);
01578 
01579                if (status == DB_INVALID_LINK)
01580                   printf("link %s points to invalid location\n", param[i]);
01581             }
01582          }
01583 
01584          if (hKey) {
01585             if ((print_info.flags & PI_LONG) && (print_info.flags & PI_VALUE) == 0) {
01586                printf
01587                    ("Key name                        Type    #Val  Size  Last Opn Mode Value\n");
01588                printf
01589                    ("---------------------------------------------------------------------------\n");
01590             }
01591 
01592             if (print_info.flags & PI_RECURSIVE) {
01593                db_scan_tree(hDB, hKey, 0, print_key, &print_info);
01594                if (cm_is_ctrlc_pressed())
01595                   cm_ack_ctrlc_pressed();
01596             } else {
01597                db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01598                if (key.type != TID_KEY)
01599                   print_key(hDB, hKey, &key, 0, &print_info);
01600                else
01601                   for (i = 0;; i++) {
01602                      if (cm_is_ctrlc_pressed()) {
01603                         cm_ack_ctrlc_pressed();
01604                         break;
01605                      }
01606 
01607                      db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
01608 
01609                      if (!hSubkey)
01610                         break;
01611 
01612                      db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
01613                      status = print_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key, 0, &print_info);
01614                      if (status == 0)
01615                         break;
01616                   }
01617             }
01618          }
01619       }
01620 
01621       /* cd */
01622       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && param[0][1] == 'd') {
01623          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01624 
01625          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01626 
01627          if (strcmp(str, "/") == 0)
01628             strcpy(pwd, str);
01629          else if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
01630             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01631             if (key.type != TID_KEY)
01632                printf("key has no subkeys\n");
01633             else
01634                db_get_path(hDB, hKey, pwd, 256);
01635          } else
01636             printf("key not found\n");
01637       }
01638 
01639       /* pwd */
01640       else if (param[0][0] == 'p' && param[0][1] == 'w') {
01641          printf("%s\n", pwd);
01642       }
01643 
01644       /* create */
01645       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && param[0][1] == 'r') {
01646          compose_name(pwd, param[2], str);
01647 
01648          /* check if array */
01649          if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == ']') {
01650             if (strchr(str, '['))
01651                j = atoi(strchr(str, '[') + 1);
01652             *strchr(str, '[') = 0;
01653          } else
01654             j = 1;
01655 
01656          /* get TID */
01657          for (i = 0; i < TID_LAST; i++) {
01658             if (equal_ustring(rpc_tid_name(i), param[1]))
01659                break;
01660          }
01661 
01662          if (i == TID_LAST) {
01663             printf("Unknown type. Must be one of:\n");
01664             printf("{ BYTE,CHAR,WORD,SHORT,DWORD,INT,BOOL,FLOAT,DOUBLE,STRING }\n");
01665          } else {
01666             db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, i);
01667             db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01668             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01669 
01670             if (i == TID_STRING) {
01671                if (!cmd_mode) {
01672                   memset(data, 0, sizeof(data));
01673 
01674                   printf("String length [%d]: ", NAME_LENGTH);
01675                   ss_gets(str, 256);
01676                   if (str[0])
01677                      key.item_size = atoi(str);
01678                   else
01679                      key.item_size = NAME_LENGTH;
01680                } else
01681                   key.item_size = NAME_LENGTH;
01682 
01683                db_set_data(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, 1, key.type);
01684             }
01685 
01686             if (j > 1) {
01687                memset(data, 0, sizeof(data));
01688 
01689                if (key.type == TID_LINK)
01690                   key.item_size = NAME_LENGTH;
01691                db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, data, key.item_size, j - 1, key.type);
01692             }
01693          }
01694       }
01695 
01696       /* mkdir */
01697       else if (param[0][0] == 'm' && param[0][1] == 'k') {
01698          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01699          db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
01700       }
01701 
01702       /* link */
01703       else if (param[0][0] == 'l' && param[0][1] == 'n') {
01704          compose_name(pwd, param[2], str);
01705          db_create_link(hDB, 0, str, param[1]);
01706       }
01707 
01708       /* copy */
01709       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && (param[0][1] == 'o' || param[0][1] == 'p')) {
01710          /* test if destination exists */
01711          compose_name(pwd, param[2], str);
01712          status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01713          if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
01714             if (cmd_mode)
01715                str[0] = 'y';
01716             else {
01717                printf("Overwrite existing key\n\"%s\"\n(y/[n]) ", str);
01718                ss_gets(str, 256);
01719             }
01720             if (str[0] == 'y')
01721                db_delete_key(hDB, hKey, FALSE);
01722          }
01723 
01724          if (status == DB_NO_KEY || str[0] == 'y') {
01725             compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01726 
01727             status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01728             if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
01729                compose_name(pwd, param[2], str);
01730 
01731                db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01732                db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, key.type);
01733 
01734                if (key.type != TID_KEY) {
01735                   size = sizeof(data);
01736                   db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key.type);
01737                   db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01738                   db_set_data(hDB, hKey, data, size, key.num_values, key.type);
01739                } else {
01740                   size = sizeof(data);
01741                   db_copy(hDB, hKey, data, &size, "");
01742                   db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01743                   db_paste(hDB, hKey, data);
01744                }
01745             } else
01746                printf("key not found\n");
01747          }
01748       }
01749 
01750       /* delete */
01751       else if ((param[0][0] == 'd' && param[0][1] == 'e') ||
01752                (param[0][0] == 'r' && param[0][1] == 'm')) {
01753          flags = 0;
01754          if ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'f') ||
01755              (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'f'))
01756             flags |= (1 << 0);
01757          if ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'l') ||
01758              (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'l'))
01759             flags |= (1 << 1);
01760 
01761          for (i = 1; param[i][0] == '-'; i++);
01762 
01763          compose_name(pwd, param[i], str);
01764 
01765          status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01766          db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
01767 
01768          if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
01769             if (flags & (1 << 0) || cmd_mode)
01770                str[0] = 'y';
01771             else {
01772                if (key.type == TID_KEY)
01773                   printf
01774                       ("Are you sure to delete the key\n\"%s\"\nand all its subkeys? (y/[n]) ",
01775                        str);
01776                else
01777                   printf("Are you sure to delete the key\n\"%s\"\n(y/[n]) ", str);
01778 
01779                ss_gets(str, 256);
01780             }
01781 
01782             if (str[0] == 'y') {
01783                status = db_delete_key(hDB, hKey, (flags & (1 << 1)) > 0);
01784                if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
01785                   printf("deletion of key not allowed\n");
01786                if (status == DB_OPEN_RECORD)
01787                   printf("key is open by other client\n");
01788             }
01789          } else
01790             printf("key not found\n");
01791       }
01792 
01793       /* set */
01794       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 'e') {
01795          /* check if index is supplied */
01796          index1 = index2 = 0;
01797          strcpy(str, param[1]);
01798          if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == ']') {
01799             if (strchr(str, '[')) {
01800                if (*(strchr(str, '[') + 1) == '*')
01801                   index1 = -1;
01802                else if (strchr((strchr(str, '[') + 1), '.')) {
01803                   index1 = atoi(strchr(str, '[') + 1);
01804                   pc = strchr(str, '[') + 1;
01805                   while (*pc != '.')
01806                      pc++;
01807                   while (*pc == '.')
01808                      pc++;
01809                   index2 = atoi(pc);
01810                } else
01811                   index1 = atoi(strchr(str, '[') + 1);
01812             }
01813             *strchr(str, '[') = 0;
01814          }
01815 
01816          if (strpbrk(str, "*?") != NULL) {
01817             db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
01818             for (i = 0;; i++) {
01819                db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
01820 
01821                if (!hSubkey)
01822                   break;
01823 
01824                db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
01825                if (match(str, key.name))
01826                   set_key(hDB, hSubkey, index1, index2, param[2]);
01827             }
01828          } else {
01829             compose_name(pwd, str, name);
01830 
01831             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, name, &hKey);
01832             if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01833                set_key(hDB, hKey, index1, index2, param[2]);
01834             else {
01835                printf("key not found\n");
01836             }
01837          }
01838       }
01839 
01840       /* set mode */
01841       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && param[0][1] == 'h' && param[0][2] == 'm') {
01842          compose_name(pwd, param[2], str);
01843 
01844          mode = atoi(param[1]);
01845 
01846          if (strcmp(str, "/") != 0)
01847             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01848          else
01849             hKey = 0;
01850 
01851          if (status == DB_SUCCESS || !hKey) {
01852             if (cmd_mode)
01853                str[0] = 'y';
01854             else {
01855                printf
01856                    ("Are you sure to change the mode of key\n  %s\nand all its subkeys\n",
01857                     str);
01858                printf("to mode [%c%c%c%c]? (y/[n]) ", mode & MODE_READ ? 'R' : 0,
01859                       mode & MODE_WRITE ? 'W' : 0, mode & MODE_DELETE ? 'D' : 0,
01860                       mode & MODE_EXCLUSIVE ? 'E' : 0);
01861                ss_gets(str, 256);
01862             }
01863             if (str[0] == 'y')
01864                db_set_mode(hDB, hKey, mode, TRUE);
01865          } else
01866             printf("key not found\n");
01867       }
01868 
01869       /* truncate */
01870       else if (param[0][0] == 't' && param[0][1] == 'r') {
01871          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01872 
01873          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01874 
01875          i = atoi(param[2]);
01876          if (i == 0)
01877             i = 1;
01878 
01879          if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01880             db_set_num_values(hDB, hKey, i);
01881          else
01882             printf("key not found\n");
01883       }
01884 
01885       /* rename */
01886       else if (param[0][0] == 'r' && param[0][1] == 'e' && param[0][2] == 'n') {
01887          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01888 
01889          if (strcmp(str, "/") != 0)
01890             status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01891          else
01892             hKey = 0;
01893 
01894          if (status == DB_SUCCESS || !hKey)
01895             db_rename_key(hDB, hKey, param[2]);
01896          else
01897             printf("key not found\n");
01898       }
01899 
01900       /* move */
01901       else if (param[0][0] == 'm' && param[0][1] == 'o') {
01902          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
01903 
01904          if (strcmp(str, "/") != 0)
01905             status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01906          else
01907             hKey = 0;
01908 
01909          if (status == DB_SUCCESS || !hKey) {
01910             if (param[2][0] == 't')
01911                i = 0;
01912             else if (param[2][0] == 'b')
01913                i = -1;
01914             else
01915                i = atoi(param[2]);
01916 
01917             status = db_reorder_key(hDB, hKey, i);
01918             if (status == DB_NO_ACCESS)
01919                printf("no write access to key\n");
01920             if (status == DB_OPEN_RECORD)
01921                printf("key is open by other client\n");
01922          } else
01923             printf("key not found\n");
01924       }
01925 
01926       /* find key */
01927       else if (param[0][0] == 'f' && param[0][1] == 'i') {
01928          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
01929 
01930          if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01931             db_scan_tree(hDB, hKey, 0, search_key, (void *) param[1]);
01932          else
01933             printf("current key is invalid / no read access\n");
01934       }
01935 
01936       /* load */
01937       else if (param[0][0] == 'l' && param[0][1] == 'o') {
01938          db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
01939 
01940          /* keep /Logger/Data dir if new one doesn't exist */
01941          cm_get_path(old_dir);
01942          size = sizeof(old_dir);
01943          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data dir", old_dir, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
01944 
01945          db_load(hDB, hKey, param[1], FALSE);
01946 
01947          str[0] = 0;
01948          size = sizeof(str);
01949          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data dir", str, &size, TID_STRING, FALSE);
01950 
01951          /* check if new one exists */
01952          getcwd(cwd, sizeof(cwd));
01953          status = chdir(str);
01954          if (status == -1) {
01955             printf
01956                 ("\"/Logger/Data dir = %s\" in file \"%s\" does not exist locally,\nset anyhow? (y/[n]): ",
01957                  str, param[1]);
01958             ss_gets(line, 256);
01959 
01960             /* restor old one */
01961             if (line[0] != 'y' && line[0] != 'Y')
01962                db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Logger/Data dir", old_dir, sizeof(old_dir), 1,
01963                             TID_STRING);
01964          }
01965 
01966          chdir(cwd);
01967       }
01968 
01969       /* save */
01970       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 'a') {
01971          db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
01972 
01973          if (strstr(param[1], ".xml") || strstr(param[1], ".XML"))
01974             db_save_xml(hDB, hKey, param[1]);
01975          else if (param[1][0] == '-') {
01976             if (param[1][1] == 'c')
01977                db_save_struct(hDB, hKey, param[2], NULL, FALSE);
01978             if (param[1][1] == 's')
01979                db_save_string(hDB, hKey, param[2], NULL, FALSE);
01980             if (param[1][1] == 'x')
01981                db_save_xml(hDB, hKey, param[2]);
01982          } else
01983             db_save(hDB, hKey, param[1], FALSE);
01984       }
01985 
01986       /* make */
01987       else if (param[0][0] == 'm' && param[0][1] == 'a') {
01988          if (param[1][0])
01989             create_experim_h(hDB, param[1]);
01990          else
01991             create_experim_h(hDB, "Analyzer");
01992       }
01993 
01994       /* passwd */
01995       else if (param[0][0] == 'p' && param[0][1] == 'a' && param[0][2] == 's') {
01996          /*
01997             strcpy(str, ss_crypt("foob", "ar"));
01998             if(strcmp(str, "arlEKn0OzVJn.") != 0)
01999             printf("Warning: ss_crypt() works incorrect");
02000           */
02001 
02002          if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Security/Password", &hKey) == DB_SUCCESS) {
02003             size = sizeof(old_password);
02004             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, old_password, &size, TID_STRING);
02005 
02006             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Old password: "));
02007             strcpy(str, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02008 
02009             if (strcmp(str, old_password) == 0 || strcmp(str, "mid7qBxsNMHux") == 0) {
02010                strcpy(str, ss_getpass("New password: "));
02011                strcpy(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02012 
02013                strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Retype new password: "));
02014                if (strcmp(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi")) != 0)
02015                   printf("Mismatch - password unchanged\n");
02016                else
02017                   db_set_data(hDB, hKey, new_password, 32, 1, TID_STRING);
02018             } else
02019                printf("Wrong password\n");
02020          } else {
02021             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Password: "));
02022             strcpy(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02023 
02024             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Retype password: "));
02025             if (strcmp(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi")) != 0)
02026                printf("Mismatch - password not set\n");
02027             else {
02028                /* set password */
02029                db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Security/Password", new_password, 32, 1,
02030                             TID_STRING);
02031 
02032                /* create empty allowed hosts and allowd programs entries */
02033                db_create_key(hDB, 0,
02034                              "/Experiment/Security/Allowed hosts/host.sample.domain",
02035                              TID_INT);
02036                db_create_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Security/Allowed programs/mstat",
02037                              TID_INT);
02038             }
02039          }
02040 
02041       }
02042 
02043       /* webpasswd */
02044       else if (param[0][0] == 'w' && param[0][1] == 'e' && param[0][2] == 'b') {
02045          if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Security/Web Password", &hKey) ==
02046              DB_SUCCESS) {
02047             size = sizeof(old_password);
02048             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, old_password, &size, TID_STRING);
02049 
02050             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Old password: "));
02051             strcpy(str, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02052 
02053             if (strcmp(str, old_password) == 0 || strcmp(str, "mid7qBxsNMHux") == 0) {
02054                strcpy(str, ss_getpass("New password: "));
02055                strcpy(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02056 
02057                strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Retype new password: "));
02058                if (strcmp(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi")) != 0)
02059                   printf("Mismatch - password unchanged\n");
02060                else
02061                   db_set_data(hDB, hKey, new_password, 32, 1, TID_STRING);
02062             } else
02063                printf("Wrong password\n");
02064          } else {
02065             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Password: "));
02066             strcpy(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi"));
02067 
02068             strcpy(str, ss_getpass("Retype password: "));
02069             if (strcmp(new_password, ss_crypt(str, "mi")) != 0)
02070                printf("Mismatch - password not set\n");
02071             else
02072                /* set password */
02073                db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Security/Web Password", new_password, 32,
02074                             1, TID_STRING);
02075          }
02076       }
02077 
02078       /* hi */
02079       else if (param[0][0] == 'h' && param[0][1] == 'i') {
02080          HNDLE hConn;
02081 
02082          client_name[0] = 0;
02083 
02084          if (!isalpha(param[1][0])) {
02085             /* find client which exports RPC_ANA_CLEAR_HISTOS */
02086             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "System/Clients", &hRootKey);
02087             if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02088                for (i = 0;; i++) {
02089                   status = db_enum_key(hDB, hRootKey, i, &hSubkey);
02090                   if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) {
02091                      printf
02092                          ("No client currently exports the CLEAR HISTO functionality.\n");
02093                      break;
02094                   }
02095 
02096                   sprintf(str, "RPC/%d", RPC_ANA_CLEAR_HISTOS);
02097                   status = db_find_key(hDB, hSubkey, str, &hKey);
02098                   if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02099                      size = sizeof(client_name);
02100                      db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "Name", client_name, &size, TID_STRING,
02101                                   TRUE);
02102                      break;
02103                   }
02104                }
02105             }
02106 
02107             if (isdigit(param[1][0]))
02108                n1 = atoi(param[1]);
02109             else
02110                n1 = 0;          /* all histos by default */
02111 
02112             if (isdigit(param[2][0]))
02113                n2 = atoi(param[2]);
02114             else
02115                n2 = n1;         /* single histo by default */
02116          } else {
02117             strcpy(client_name, param[1]);
02118 
02119             if (isdigit(param[2][0]))
02120                n1 = atoi(param[2]);
02121             else
02122                n1 = 0;          /* all histos by default */
02123 
02124             if (isdigit(param[3][0]))
02125                n2 = atoi(param[3]);
02126             else
02127                n2 = n1;         /* single histo by default */
02128          }
02129 
02130          if (client_name[0]) {
02131             if (cm_connect_client(client_name, &hConn) == CM_SUCCESS) {
02132                rpc_client_call(hConn, RPC_ANA_CLEAR_HISTOS, n1, n2);
02133                cm_disconnect_client(hConn, FALSE);
02134             } else
02135                printf("Cannot connect to client %s\n", client_name);
02136          }
02137       }
02138 
02139       /* import */
02140       else if (param[0][0] == 'i' && param[0][1] == 'm') {
02141          int fh;
02142 
02143          fh = open(param[1], O_RDONLY | O_TEXT);
02144          if (fh < 0)
02145             printf("File %s not found\n", param[1]);
02146          else {
02147             size = lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_END);
02148             lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_SET);
02149             size = read(fh, data, size);
02150             data[size++] = 0;
02151             close(fh);
02152 
02153             if (param[2][0] == 0) {
02154                printf("Key name: ");
02155                ss_gets(name, 256);
02156             } else
02157                strcpy(name, param[2]);
02158 
02159             compose_name(pwd, name, str);
02160 
02161             db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_STRING);
02162             db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
02163             db_set_data(hDB, hKey, data, size, 1, TID_STRING);
02164          }
02165 
02166       }
02167 
02168       /* export */
02169       else if (param[0][0] == 'e' && param[0][1] == 'x' && param[0][2] == 'p') {
02170          FILE *f;
02171 
02172          if (param[1][0] == 0)
02173             printf("please specify key\n");
02174          else {
02175             compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
02176 
02177             db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
02178             if (hKey == 0)
02179                printf("key \"%s\" not found\n", param[1]);
02180             else {
02181                if (param[2][0] == 0) {
02182                   printf("File name: ");
02183                   ss_gets(name, 256);
02184                } else
02185                   strcpy(name, param[2]);
02186 
02187                f = fopen(name, "w");
02188                if (f == NULL)
02189                   printf("Cannot open file \"%s\"\n", name);
02190                else {
02191                   db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
02192                   if (key.type != TID_STRING)
02193                      printf("Only export of STRING key possible\n");
02194                   else {
02195                      size = sizeof(data);
02196                      memset(data, 0, size);
02197                      db_get_data(hDB, hKey, data, &size, key.type);
02198 
02199                      fprintf(f, data);
02200                      fclose(f);
02201                   }
02202                }
02203             }
02204          }
02205       }
02206 
02207       /* rewind */
02208       else if (param[0][0] == 'r' && param[0][1] == 'e' && param[0][2] == 'w') {
02209          HNDLE hConn;
02210 
02211          /* check if run is stopped and no transition in progress */
02212          size = sizeof(i);
02213          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &i, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
02214          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &j, &size, TID_INT,
02215                       TRUE);
02216          if (i != STATE_STOPPED || j == 1) {
02217             printf
02218                 ("Cannot rewind tapes when run is not stopped or transition in progress\n");
02219          } else {
02220             if (param[1][0] == 0)
02221                channel = -1;
02222             else
02223                channel = atoi(param[1]);
02224 
02225             /* find client which exports RPC_LOG_REWIND */
02226             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "System/Clients", &hRootKey);
02227             if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02228                for (i = 0;; i++) {
02229                   status = db_enum_key(hDB, hRootKey, i, &hSubkey);
02230                   if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) {
02231                      printf("No active logger found.\n");
02232                      break;
02233                   }
02234 
02235                   sprintf(str, "RPC/%d", RPC_LOG_REWIND);
02236                   status = db_find_key(hDB, hSubkey, str, &hKey);
02237                   if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02238                      size = sizeof(client_name);
02239                      db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "Name", client_name, &size, TID_STRING,
02240                                   TRUE);
02241                      break;
02242                   }
02243                }
02244             }
02245 
02246             if (status != DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS) {
02247                if (cm_connect_client(client_name, &hConn) == CM_SUCCESS) {
02248                   /* increase timeout */
02249                   rpc_set_option(hConn, RPC_OTIMEOUT, 600000);
02250 
02251                   if (channel == -1)
02252                      printf("Rewinding all channels...\n");
02253                   else
02254                      printf("Rewinding channel %d...\n", channel);
02255 
02256                   status = rpc_client_call(hConn, RPC_LOG_REWIND, channel);
02257                   cm_disconnect_client(hConn, FALSE);
02258 
02259                   if (status == CM_SUCCESS)
02260                      printf("Rewind successful\n");
02261                   else
02262                      printf("Rewind error, code = %d\n", status);
02263                } else
02264                   printf("Cannot connect to logger\n");
02265             }
02266          }
02267       }
02268 
02269       /* alarm reset */
02270       else if (param[0][0] == 'a' && param[0][1] == 'l') {
02271          /* go through all alarms */
02272          db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Alarms/Alarms", &hKey);
02273          if (hKey) {
02274             for (i = 0;; i++) {
02275                db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
02276 
02277                if (!hSubkey)
02278                   break;
02279 
02280                db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
02281                status = al_reset_alarm(key.name);
02282                if (status == AL_RESET)
02283                   printf("Alarm of class \"%s\" reset sucessfully\n", key.name);
02284             }
02285          }
02286       }
02287 
02288       /* mem */
02289       else if (param[0][0] == 'm' && param[0][1] == 'e') {
02290          if (rpc_is_remote())
02291             printf("This function works only locally\n");
02292          else {
02293             db_show_mem(hDB, data, sizeof(data), param[1][0]);
02294             puts(data);
02295          }
02296       }
02297 
02298       /* sor (show open records) */
02299       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 'o') {
02300          db_find_key(hDB, 0, pwd, &hKey);
02301          db_get_open_records(hDB, hKey, data, sizeof(data), FALSE);
02302          printf(data);
02303       }
02304 
02305       /* scl (show clients ) */
02306       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 'c') {
02307          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "System/Clients", &hKey);
02308          if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
02309             cm_msg(MERROR, "command_loop",
02310                    "cannot find System/Clients entry in database");
02311          else {
02312             if (param[1][1] == 'w')
02313                printf("Name                Host                Timeout    Last called\n");
02314             else
02315                printf("Name                Host\n");
02316 
02317             /* search database for clients with transition mask set */
02318             for (i = 0, status = 0;; i++) {
02319                status = db_enum_key(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
02320                if (status == DB_NO_MORE_SUBKEYS)
02321                   break;
02322 
02323                if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02324                   size = sizeof(name);
02325                   db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "Name", name, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
02326                   printf(name);
02327                   for (j = 0; j < 20 - (int) strlen(name); j++)
02328                      printf(" ");
02329 
02330                   size = sizeof(str);
02331                   db_get_value(hDB, hSubkey, "Host", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
02332                   printf(str);
02333                   for (j = 0; j < 20 - (int) strlen(str); j++)
02334                      printf(" ");
02335 
02336                   /* display optional watchdog info */
02337                   if (param[1][1] == 'w') {
02338                      DWORD timeout, last;
02339 
02340                      status = cm_get_watchdog_info(hDB, name, &timeout, &last);
02341                      printf("%-10ld %-10ld", timeout, last);
02342                   }
02343 
02344                   printf("\n");
02345                }
02346             }
02347          }
02348       }
02349 
02350       /* start */
02351       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 't' && param[0][2] == 'a') {
02352          debug_flag = ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'v') ||
02353                        (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'v'));
02354 
02355          /* check if run is already started */
02356          size = sizeof(i);
02357          i = STATE_STOPPED;
02358          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &i, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
02359          if (i == STATE_RUNNING) {
02360             printf("Run is already started\n");
02361          } else if (i == STATE_PAUSED) {
