02362             printf("Run is paused, please use \"resume\"\n");
02363          } else {
02364             /* check if transition in progress */
02365             i = 0;
02366             db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i, &size, TID_INT,
02367                          TRUE);
02368             if (i == 1) {
02369                printf("Start/Stop already in progress, please try again later\n");
02370                printf("or set \"/Runinfo/Transition in progress\" manually to zero.\n");
02371             } else {
02372                /* get present run number */
02373                old_run_number = 0;
02374                status =
02375                    db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Run number", &old_run_number, &size,
02376                                 TID_INT, TRUE);
02377                assert(status == SUCCESS);
02378                assert(old_run_number >= 0);
02379 
02380                /* edit run parameter if command is not "start now" */
02381                if ((param[1][0] == 'n' && param[1][1] == 'o' && param[1][2] == 'w') ||
02382                    cmd_mode) {
02383                   new_run_number = old_run_number + 1;
02384                   line[0] = 'y';
02385                } else {
02386                   db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Edit on start", &hKey);
02387                   do {
02388                      if (hKey) {
02389                         for (i = 0;; i++) {
02390                            db_enum_link(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
02391 
02392                            if (!hSubkey)
02393                               break;
02394 
02395                            db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
02396                            strcpy(str, key.name);
02397 
02398                            if (equal_ustring(str, "Edit run number"))
02399                               continue;
02400 
02401                            db_enum_key(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
02402                            db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
02403 
02404                            size = sizeof(data);
02405                            status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubkey, data, &size, key.type);
02406                            if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
02407                               continue;
02408 
02409                            for (j = 0; j < key.num_values; j++) {
02410                               db_sprintf(data_str, data, key.item_size, j, key.type);
02411                               sprintf(prompt, "%s : ", str);
02412 
02413                               strcpy(line, data_str);
02414                               in_cmd_edit = TRUE;
02415                               cmd_edit(prompt, line, NULL, cmd_idle);
02416                               in_cmd_edit = FALSE;
02417 
02418                               if (line[0]) {
02419                                  db_sscanf(line, data, &size, j, key.type);
02420                                  db_set_data_index(hDB, hSubkey, data, size + 1, j,
02421                                                    key.type);
02422                               }
02423                            }
02424                         }
02425                      }
02426 
02427                      /* increment run number */
02428                      new_run_number = old_run_number + 1;
02429                      printf("Run number [%d]: ", new_run_number);
02430                      ss_gets(line, 256);
02431                      if (line[0] && atoi(line) > 0)
02432                         new_run_number = atoi(line);
02433 
02434                      printf("Are the above parameters correct? ([y]/n/q): ");
02435                      ss_gets(line, 256);
02436 
02437                   } while (line[0] == 'n' || line[0] == 'N');
02438                }
02439 
02440                if (line[0] != 'q' && line[0] != 'Q') {
02441                   /* start run */
02442                   printf("Starting run #%d\n", new_run_number);
02443 
02444                   i = 1;
02445                   status =
02446                       db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i,
02447                                    sizeof(INT), 1, TID_INT);
02448                   assert(status == SUCCESS);
02449 
02450                   assert(new_run_number > 0);
02451 
02452                   status =
02453                       cm_transition(TR_START, new_run_number, str, sizeof(str), SYNC,
02454                                     debug_flag);
02455                   if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
02456                      /* in case of error, reset run number */
02457                      status =
02458                          db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Run number", &old_run_number,
02459                                       size, 1, TID_INT);
02460                      assert(status == SUCCESS);
02461 
02462                      printf("Error: %s\n", str);
02463                   }
02464 
02465                   i = 0;
02466                   status =
02467                       db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i,
02468                                    sizeof(INT), 1, TID_INT);
02469                   assert(status == SUCCESS);
02470                }
02471             }
02472          }
02473       }
02474 
02475       /* stop */
02476       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 't' && param[0][2] == 'o') {
02477          debug_flag = ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'v') ||
02478                        (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'v'));
02479 
02480          /* check if transition in progress */
02481          i = 0;
02482          size = sizeof(INT);
02483          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i, &size, TID_INT,
02484                       TRUE);
02485          if (i == 1) {
02486             printf("Start/Stop already in progress, please try again later\n");
02487             printf("or set \"/Runinfo/Transition in progress\" manually to zero.\n");
02488          } else {
02489             /* check if run is stopped */
02490             state = STATE_STOPPED;
02491             size = sizeof(i);
02492             db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &state, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
02493             str[0] = 0;
02494             if (state == STATE_STOPPED && !cmd_mode) {
02495                printf("Run is already stopped. Stop again? (y/[n]) ");
02496                ss_gets(str, 256);
02497             }
02498             if (str[0] == 'y' || state != STATE_STOPPED || cmd_mode) {
02499                i = 1;
02500                db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i, sizeof(INT), 1,
02501                             TID_INT);
02502 
02503                if (param[1][0] == 'n')
02504                   status =
02505                       cm_transition(TR_STOP | TR_DEFERRED, 0, str, sizeof(str), SYNC,
02506                                     debug_flag);
02507                else
02508                   status = cm_transition(TR_STOP, 0, str, sizeof(str), SYNC, debug_flag);
02509 
02510                if (status == CM_DEFERRED_TRANSITION)
02511                   printf("%s\n", str);
02512                else if (status == CM_TRANSITION_IN_PROGRESS)
02513                   printf
02514                       ("Deferred stop already in progress, enter \"stop now\" to force stop\n");
02515                else if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02516                   printf("Error: %s\n", str);
02517 
02518                i = 0;
02519                db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/Transition in progress", &i, sizeof(INT), 1,
02520                             TID_INT);
02521             }
02522          }
02523       }
02524 
02525       /* pause */
02526       else if (param[0][0] == 'p' && param[0][1] == 'a' && param[0][2] == 'u') {
02527          debug_flag = ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'v') ||
02528                        (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'v'));
02529 
02530          /* check if run is started */
02531          i = STATE_STOPPED;
02532          size = sizeof(i);
02533          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &i, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
02534          if (i != STATE_RUNNING) {
02535             printf("Run is not started\n");
02536          } else {
02537             if (param[1][0] == 'n')
02538                status =
02539                    cm_transition(TR_PAUSE | TR_DEFERRED, 0, str, sizeof(str), SYNC,
02540                                  debug_flag);
02541             else
02542                status = cm_transition(TR_PAUSE, 0, str, sizeof(str), SYNC, debug_flag);
02543 
02544             if (status == CM_DEFERRED_TRANSITION)
02545                printf("%s\n", str);
02546             else if (status == CM_TRANSITION_IN_PROGRESS)
02547                printf
02548                    ("Deferred pause already in progress, enter \"pause now\" to force pause\n");
02549             else if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02550                printf("Error: %s\n", str);
02551          }
02552       }
02553 
02554       /* resume */
02555       else if (param[0][0] == 'r' && param[0][1] == 'e' && param[0][2] == 's') {
02556          debug_flag = ((param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'v') ||
02557                        (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'v'));
02558 
02559          /* check if run is paused */
02560          i = STATE_STOPPED;
02561          size = sizeof(i);
02562          db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Runinfo/State", &i, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
02563          if (i != STATE_PAUSED) {
02564             printf("Run is not paused\n");
02565          } else {
02566             status = cm_transition(TR_RESUME, 0, str, sizeof(str), SYNC, debug_flag);
02567             if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
02568                printf("Error: %s\n", str);
02569          }
02570       }
02571 
02572       /* msg */
02573       else if (param[0][0] == 'm' && param[0][1] == 's') {
02574          /*
02575             if (cm_exist("Speaker", FALSE) != CM_SUCCESS)
02576             printf("Note: No speaker application present.\n");
02577           */
02578 
02579          /* user message type by default */
02580          msg_type = MT_USER;
02581          message[0] = 0;
02582          if (cmd_mode)
02583             strcpy(user_name, "script");
02584 
02585          if (param[3][0]) {
02586             msg_type = atoi(param[1]);
02587             last_msg_time = ss_time();
02588             strcpy(user_name, param[2]);
02589             strcpy(message, param[3]);
02590          } else if (param[2][0]) {
02591             last_msg_time = ss_time();
02592             strcpy(user_name, param[1]);
02593             strcpy(message, param[2]);
02594          } else if (param[1][0])
02595             strcpy(message, param[1]);
02596 
02597          if (!cmd_mode) {
02598             if (ss_time() - last_msg_time > 300) {
02599                printf("Your name> ");
02600                ss_gets(user_name, 80);
02601             }
02602 
02603             if (param[1][0] == 0) {
02604                printf("Msg> ");
02605                ss_gets(message, 256);
02606             }
02607          }
02608 
02609          if (message[0])
02610             cm_msg(msg_type, __FILE__, __LINE__, user_name, message);
02611 
02612          last_msg_time = ss_time();
02613       }
02614 
02615       /* chat */
02616       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && param[0][1] == 'h' && param[0][2] == 'a') {
02617          message[0] = 0;
02618 
02619          if (ss_time() - last_msg_time > 300) {
02620             printf("Your name> ");
02621             ss_gets(user_name, 80);
02622          }
02623 
02624          printf("Exit chat mode with empty line.\n");
02625          do {
02626             in_cmd_edit = TRUE;
02627             message[0] = 0;
02628             cmd_edit("> ", message, NULL, cmd_idle);
02629             in_cmd_edit = FALSE;
02630 
02631             if (message[0])
02632                cm_msg(MUSER, user_name, message);
02633 
02634          } while (message[0]);
02635 
02636          last_msg_time = ss_time();
02637       }
02638 
02639       /* old */
02640       else if (param[0][0] == 'o' && param[0][1] == 'l') {
02641          i = 20;
02642          if (param[1][0])
02643             i = atoi(param[1]);
02644 
02645          size = sizeof(data);
02646          cm_msg_retrieve(i, data, &size);
02647          printf(data);
02648       }
02649 
02650       /* cleanup */
02651       else if (param[0][0] == 'c' && param[0][1] == 'l') {
02652          HNDLE hBuf;
02653          BOOL force;
02654 
02655          force = FALSE;
02656          if (param[1][0] == '-' && param[1][1] == 'f')
02657             force = TRUE;
02658          if (param[2][0] == '-' && param[2][1] == 'f')
02659             force = TRUE;
02660 
02661          bm_open_buffer(EVENT_BUFFER_NAME, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE, &hBuf);
02662 
02663          if (param[1][0] && param[1][0] != '-')
02664             cm_cleanup(param[1], force);
02665          else
02666             cm_cleanup("", force);
02667          bm_close_buffer(hBuf);
02668 
02669          db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/", &hKey);
02670          db_get_open_records(hDB, hKey, data, sizeof(data), TRUE);
02671          printf(data);
02672       }
02673 
02674       /* shutdown */
02675       else if (param[0][0] == 's' && param[0][1] == 'h') {
02676          if (param[1][0] == 0)
02677             printf("Please enter client name or \"all\" to shutdown all clients.\n");
02678          else {
02679             status = cm_shutdown(param[1], TRUE);
02680             if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
02681                if (strcmp(param[1], "all") == 0)
02682                   printf("No clients found\n");
02683                else
02684                   printf("Client %s not active\n", param[1]);
02685             }
02686          }
02687       }
02688 
02689       /* ver */
02690       else if (param[0][0] == 'v' && param[0][1] == 'e') {
02691          printf("MIDAS library version %s\n", cm_get_version());
02692          printf("ODB version %d\n", DATABASE_VERSION);
02693       }
02694 
02695       /* exec */
02696       else if (param[0][0] == 'e' && param[0][1] == 'x' && param[0][2] == 'e') {
02697          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
02698 
02699          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
02700          if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
02701             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
02702             if (key.type != TID_STRING) {
02703                printf("Key contains no command\n");
02704                continue;
02705             }
02706             size = sizeof(str);
02707             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, str, &size, key.type);
02708 
02709             cm_execute(str, data, sizeof(data));
02710          } else {
02711             cm_execute(param[1], data, sizeof(data));
02712          }
02713          puts(data);
02714       }
02715 
02716       /* wait */
02717       else if (param[0][0] == 'w' && param[0][1] == 'a') {
02718          compose_name(pwd, param[1], str);
02719 
02720          if (strcmp(str, "/") != 0)
02721             status = db_find_link(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
02722          else
02723             hKey = 0;
02724 
02725          if (status == DB_SUCCESS || !hKey) {
02726             db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
02727             printf("Waiting for key \"%s\" to be modified, abort with \"!\"\n", key.name);
02728             db_get_record_size(hDB, hKey, 0, &size);
02729             db_open_record(hDB, hKey, data, size, MODE_READ, key_update, NULL);
02730             key_modified = FALSE;
02731 
02732             i = 0;
02733             do {
02734                cm_yield(1000);
02735 
02736                while (ss_kbhit()) {
02737                   i = ss_getchar(0);
02738                   if (i == -1)
02739                      i = getchar();
02740 
02741                   if ((char) i == '!')
02742                      break;
02743                }
02744 
02745             } while (!key_modified && i != '!');
02746 
02747             db_close_record(hDB, hKey);
02748             if (i == '!')
02749                printf("Wait aborted.\n");
02750             else
02751                printf("Key has been modified.\n");
02752          } else
02753             printf("key not found\n");
02754       }
02755 
02756       /* test 1  */
02757       else if (param[0][0] == 't' && param[0][1] == '1') {
02758          DWORD start_time;
02759          INT i, size, rn;
02760          HNDLE hKey;
02761 
02762          start_time = ss_millitime();
02763          status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/runinfo/run number", &hKey);
02764          assert(status == SUCCESS);
02765          size = sizeof(rn);
02766 
02767          i = 0;
02768          do {
02769             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02770             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02771             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02772             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02773             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02774             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02775             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02776             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02777             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02778             db_get_data(hDB, hKey, &rn, &size, TID_INT);
02779             i += 10;
02780          } while (ss_millitime() - start_time < 5000);
02781 
02782          printf("%d accesses per second\n", i / 5);
02783       }
02784 
02785       /* test 2 */
02786       else if (param[0][0] == 't' && param[0][1] == '2') {
02787          do {
02788             do {
02789                i = ss_getchar(0);
02790                printf("%d\n", i);
02791             } while (i > 0 && i != 4);
02792 
02793             ss_sleep(1000);
02794          } while (i != 4);
02795 
02796          ss_getchar(1);
02797       }
02798 
02799       /* test 3 */
02800       else if (param[0][0] == 't' && param[0][1] == '3') {
02801       }
02802 
02803       /* exit/quit */
02804       else if ((param[0][0] == 'e' && param[0][1] == 'x' && param[0][2] == 'i') ||
02805                (param[0][0] == 'q'))
02806          break;
02807 
02808       else if (param[0][0] == 0);
02809 
02810       else
02811          printf("Unknown command %s %s %s\n", param[0], param[1], param[2]);
02812 
02813       /* exit after single command */
02814       if (cmd_mode && cmd[0] != '@')
02815          break;
02816 
02817       /* check if client connections are broken */
02818       status = cm_yield(0);
02819       if (status == SS_ABORT)
02820          break;
02821 
02822    } while (TRUE);
02823 
02824    /* check if client connections are broken */
02825    for (i = 0; i < MAX_RPC_CONNECTION; i++)
02826       cm_yield(0);
02827 
02828    return;
02829 }
02830 
02831 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
02832 
02833 #ifdef OS_VXWORKS
02834 int odbedit(char *ahost_name, char *aexp_name)
02835 #else
02836 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
02837 #endif
02838 {
02839    INT status, i, odb_size, size;
02840    char host_name[HOST_NAME_LENGTH], exp_name[NAME_LENGTH];
02841    char cmd[256], dir[100], str[256];
02842    BOOL debug;
02843    BOOL corrupted;
02844    HNDLE hDB;
02845 
02846    cmd[0] = dir[0] = 0;
02847    odb_size = DEFAULT_ODB_SIZE;
02848    debug = corrupted = cmd_mode = FALSE;
02849 
02850 #ifdef OS_VXWORKS
02851    strcpy(host_name, ahost_name);
02852    strcpy(exp_name, aexp_name);
02853 #else
02854 
02855    /* get default from environment */
02856    cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), exp_name, sizeof(exp_name));
02857 
02858    /* check for MIDASSYS */
02859    if (!getenv("MIDASSYS")) {
02860       puts("Please define environment variable 'MIDASSYS'");
02861       puts("pointing to the midas installation directory.");
02862    }
02863 
02864    /* parse command line parameters */
02865    for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
02866       if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'g')
02867          debug = TRUE;
02868       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'C')
02869          corrupted = TRUE;
02870       else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
02871          if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
02872             goto usage;
02873          if (argv[i][1] == 'e')
02874             strcpy(exp_name, argv[++i]);
02875          else if (argv[i][1] == 'h')
02876             strcpy(host_name, argv[++i]);
02877          else if (argv[i][1] == 'c') {
02878             if (strlen(argv[i]) >= 256) {
02879                printf("error: command line too long (>256).\n");
02880                return 0;
02881             }
02882             strcpy(cmd, argv[++i]);
02883             cmd_mode = TRUE;
02884          } else if (argv[i][1] == 'd')
02885             strcpy(dir, argv[++i]);
02886          else if (argv[i][1] == 's')
02887             odb_size = atoi(argv[++i]);
02888          else {
02889           usage:
02890             printf("usage: odbedit [-h Hostname] [-e Experiment] [-d ODB Subtree]\n");
02891             printf("               [-c Command] [-c @CommandFile] [-s size]\n");
02892             printf("               [-g (debug)] [-C (connect to corrupted ODB)]\n\n");
02893             printf("For a list of valid commands start odbedit interactively\n");
02894             printf("and type \"help\".\n");
02895             return 0;
02896          }
02897       } else
02898          strcpy(host_name, argv[i]);
02899    }
02900 #endif
02901 
02902    /* no startup message if called with command */
02903    if (cmd[0])
02904       cm_set_msg_print(MT_ERROR, 0, NULL);
02905 
02906    status = cm_connect_experiment1(host_name, exp_name, "ODBEdit", NULL,
02907                                    odb_size, DEFAULT_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT);
02908    if (status == CM_WRONG_PASSWORD)
02909       return 1;
02910    else if ((status == DB_INVALID_HANDLE) && corrupted) {
02911       cm_get_error(status, str);
02912       puts(str);
02913       printf("ODB is corrupted, connecting anyway...\n");
02914    } else if (status != CM_SUCCESS) {
02915       cm_get_error(status, str);
02916       puts(str);
02917       return 1;
02918    }
02919 
02920    /* place a request for system messages */
02921    cm_msg_register(process_message);
02922 
02923    /* route local messages through print_message */
02924    cm_set_msg_print(MT_ALL, MT_ERROR, print_message);
02925 
02926    /* turn off watchdog if in debug mode */
02927    if (debug)
02928       cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
02929 
02930    /* get experiment name */
02931    if (!exp_name[0]) {
02932       cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
02933       size = NAME_LENGTH;
02934       db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Experiment/Name", exp_name, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
02935    }
02936 
02937    /* command loop */
02938    command_loop(host_name, exp_name, cmd, dir);
02939 
02940    /* no shutdown message if called with command */
02941    if (cmd_mode)
02942       cm_set_msg_print(MT_ERROR, 0, NULL);
02943 
02944    cm_disconnect_experiment();
02945 
02946    return 0;
02947 }
